a.title: CORPORATE training that sticks for your entire organization

li.a:
CORPORATE
training that sticks
for your entire organization

ABOUT
microlearning,
business psychology and Nancy

div.p:
You Are Here: Home » BLOG
learning curve 2.0 » Brain Power, Communication, Life Lessons, On Success » Quick Quotes

div.class: hentry post author-admin category-brain-power category-communication category-life-lessons category-on-success

div.p: Today I’m going to do something different with some quotes.
Action – I’d like you to grab a sheet of paper.
I’m going to share with you a quote, and when you’ve read it, write a word or two that describes your initial reaction to what you see. Just do one at a time.

p.em: Show me a thoroughly satisfied man and I will show you a failure.
Our ultimate freedom is the right and power to decide how anybody or anything outside ourselves will affect us.

div.p: What do you think of that?

p.em: What is necessary to change a person is to change his awareness of himself.

div.p: What pops into your head when you read that?

p.em: The world is filled with willing people; some willing to work, the rest willing to let them.

div.p: And that one – what do you think about that?
Now, what do ALL your written words tell you?
Our thoughts can turn into springboards if we allow ourselves a few moments to reflect.
There are no comments yet. Be the first and leave a response!

form.p: Wanting to leave an <em>phasis on your comment?

HTML is allowed in the comment box above. You can use the following tags: , , , ,
, , , .

noscript.p: Please note: JavaScript is required to post comments.
